subject: Baseball
Tornadoes
Interscholastic Athletics
Playoff Games
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: After a tornado ravaged a high school in Ringgold, Ga., schools that were rivals in the standings opened their fields and supply closets so that Ringgold’s baseball team could compete in the playoffs.
snippet: After a tornado ravaged a high school in Ringgold, Ga., schools that were rivals in the standings opened their fields and supply closets so that Ringgold’s baseball team could compete in the playoffs.
